title: Riot please unban me i swear i won't do it again.
body:
Riot please,im addicted to League of Legends,please unban me i swear to my life i won't do it again,please just give me one more chance, i know you are reading this so pleaseeeee unban me i swear i won't say a single word in my entire next games,please Riot,i beg you i really miss my account.Pleaseeeee unban me i beg you!                    

{{sticker:cass-cry}} 

Chat log:
Game 1
deadkiller179: oh its definetly not blitz in that bush
deadkiller179: and def not ashe with him

deadkiller179: SUURE IM FEEDING

deadkiller179: hes getting chat restrict 100 percentr
deadkiller179: WTH
deadkiller179: ASHE SEND UR E AND LOOK AT ME
deadkiller179: OMG HE CAN LIE SO HARD LMAOOO
deadkiller179: honestly i feel sorry for your mother last night
deadkiller179: this %%%%% cant stop talking...
deadkiller179: get ready for salt

deadkiller179: bie
THIS WAS ONLY BECAUSE I HAD TO LEAVE CAUSE MY SISTER DIED! AND THEY PUTTED PREASURE ON ME TO NOT LEAVE AND THEY SCARED ME SAYING THAT THEY WILL REPORT ME FOR AFK!

replies.body: The fact that you bring your sister's death as an excuse for being toxic is really sad.

Once an account is banned it is never unbanned unless the ban was placed in error. This ban was 100% not placed in error, judging from these logs. I'm afraid I can't bring you good news: the account is lost for good.

And what about everything before the 
"I gtg"
Bit?

>deadkiller179: varus flaming
deadkiller179: he said "you eat your mom out"
deadkiller179: sending the chat
deadkiller179: hes getting chat restrict 100 percentr

Ironic

Also, this
>deadkiller179: WTH
deadkiller179: ASHE SEND UR E AND LOOK AT ME
deadkiller179: OMG HE CAN LIE SO HARD LMAOOO
deadkiller179: honestly i feel sorry for your mother last night
deadkiller179: this %%%%% cant stop talking...

> deadkiller179: unlike you guys i have a life

lmao
I don't believe you that your sister died tbh. If I got a call that my sister died while I was playing league I would alt f4 and go, instead of detailing my teammates on how I fucked their mom lmao.
Lol you got rekt by the ban hammer.
